issue.title: [CF 1027] Icon of doom doesn't show
issue.body:
Hello, I'm a player of CWOW and I enjoy using TellMeWhen to help me. But as a demonology warlock, I find that the icon of doom (Metamorphosis version of corruption) can't be shown normally before I used it once. In every test, after I use doom once, it can monitor the Debuff normally with correct icon shown, but before I use doom a clock icon is shown instead.
The servers are in maintainence at this moment, and I'll attach the screen shot along with the string as soon as possible


> Posted by CurseForge user ethereal64 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1027 | Raw

comments.body:
This is normal - if a spell is tracked by name and it is not in your spellbook, TellMeWhen can't figure out what texture to use.

You can fix this by either tracking the spell by its spellID, or you can set a custom texture on the icon (which is the easier option, because if you track by spellID then you need to be 100% sure that you are using the correct ID).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
